description: Module that allows you to sanction users who send invites from other servers.

action.description: Set the action to take when someone sends an invite.

action.name: action
action.description: Action to take when someone sends an invite.

time.name: time
time.description: Time of the action (in case of being temporary).

filo.description: Enable or disable the bypass of invites from the official Filo's server.

action.name: action
action.description: Enable or disable the bypass of invites from the official Filo's server.

discord.description: Enable or disable the bypass of invites from the official Discord's servers.

arguments.name: action
arguments.description: Enable or disable the bypass of invites from the official Discord's servers.

guild.description: Add or remove a guild from the module's guild bypass list.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

guild.name: guild
guild.description: Guild from the module's guild bypass list.

channel.description: Add or remove a channel from the list of ignored channels.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel from the module's channel bypass list.

role.description: Add or remove a role from the list of ignored roles.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

role.name: role
role.description: Role from the module's role bypass list.

docs.description: Get the link of the anti-invites module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the anti-invites module.

reset.description: Restores the module settings to the original ones (data can't be recovered).

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
